title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, September 8, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1952 that Ernest Hemingway published “The Old Man and the Sea,” the last book published during his lifetime.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1952 that Ernest Hemingway published “The Old Man and the Sea,” the last book published during his lifetime.
